subject: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Greening of National Highways through CSR Scheme of Plantation- reg.
text: IRai 75q TTHTif 9fetraz<ut (Tsw 4Rde7 & RTAN HART4, MRG TRTFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Azna Td vi-5 Wd 6, Te7-10, E1VT, 78f @orll 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TMI/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Environment/2024 Policy Circular No.7.4.15/2024 dated 21st October, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No_ EGHDIV-12030/23/2024-ENV & GHD Division (Comp. No. 259742)} Sub: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Greening of National Highways through CSR Scheme of Plantation- reg: Pursuant to the decision taken in 634th Executive Committee Meeting held on 05.10.2024, the Competent   Authority of NHAI has   approved the Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Greening of National Highways through CSR Scheme of Plantation: 2 The SOP (enclosed) is intended for better understanding and clarity in execution of the CSR Scheme of Plantation. 3_ Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) for Implementation of Plantation and landscaping through CSR Fund was earlier issued by GHD vide its letter no. 1013/1/2k/Env./677 dated 20.09.2019. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above 21he2l (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices Copy to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation. '91 T &9 NHAI
